name: Unspoken Name
source: Pathfinder #140: Eulogy for Roslar's Coffer pg. 73
text: Prized among those who seek to monitor the attention paid to them, this spell is said to be used by Arazni to identify those followers who dare refer to her as “the Harlot Queen” so she might summarily dismiss them. When you cast this spell, designate a word, phrase, or name. If a creature within 1 mile of you uses that word, phrase, or name to refer to you, you immediately learn that creature’s name, appearance, and location. This discharges the spell.
duration_zh: 24小时, 或 直至能量发散
text_zh: 这个法术对那些想知道有谁在关注着自己的人十分有用。据传，阿拉兹妮用这个法术来辨别出那些胆敢称她为「娼妇皇后」（Harlot Queen）的信徒，这样她便可以立即弃逐他们。当你施展此法术时，先设置一个字、片语或名字。若你1哩内有生物用了那个字、片语或名字来指称你，你会立即知道该生物的名字、外表与所在位置。这会消解此法术。
